encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

keywords.term: hymn to an (unnamed) ascete or martyr

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Multiple changes need to be done in the text!!! Meta: change display title to "Hymn(s) to an ascete or martyr", delete legacy. Text: l.1, reverse <:ὅς|reg|ὥς:>, as ος is on the ostr. L. 2: change the markup of the line <:φιλέρημος||alt||φιρηλήμων|φαιδρύνων:> καὶ πρὸ τοῦ <:Stelle offensichtlich korrupt:>. First, <:φιλέρημος=Crum, P. Mon. Epiph. p. 314|ed|φιρηλημων:>; then add in the commentary 'φαιδρύνων may have been meant (White)'. L. 5: <:μητοίχομεν ὑμεῖν|alt|μετέχομεν ὕμνων (?):> Use the reg markup, delete accentuation in the text on the ostracon. L. 6. Change <:ὑῶ̣ν|alt|ὕμνον:> to |reg| with (?), for the ostracon text, give υμω̣ν. L. 9. The markup is wrong for the entire line. Record the ostracon text without diacritics and offer proposed regularizations with reg tags. L. 11: delete all diacritics on ὐξοτομία. Verso, l. 3: change accent to grave in ζημειωθείς. L. 5: ἐ̣π̣άγω: change to ἐ̣π̣’ ἀ̣γ<αθ>ῷ dotting pi and alpha; τὸν ψήχον ἡμῶν: delete accents, regularize only if done so in the notes on p. 394 or add commentaries with possible parallels. Mark up the *dash*.
Submit - I submit to P. Mon. Epiph. 594, proofread print edition.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Multiple changes need to be done in the text!!! Meta: change display title to "Hymn(s) to an ascete or martyr", delete legacy. Text: l.1, reverse <:ὅς|reg|ὥς:>, as ος is on the ostr. L. 2: change the markup of the line <:φιλέρημος||alt||φιρηλήμων|φαιδρύνων:> καὶ πρὸ τοῦ <:Stelle offensichtlich korrupt:>. First, <:φιλέρημος=Crum, P. Mon. Epiph. p. 314|ed|φιρηλημων:>; then add in the commentary 'φαιδρύνων may have been meant (White)'. L. 5: <:μητοίχομεν ὑμεῖν|alt|μετέχομεν ὕμνων (?):> Use the reg markup, delete accentuation in the text on the ostracon. L. 6. Change <:ὑῶ̣ν|alt|ὕμνον:> to |reg| with (?), for the ostracon text, give υμω̣ν. L. 9. The markup is wrong for the entire line. Record the ostracon text without diacritics and offer proposed regularizations with reg tags. L. 11: delete all diacritics on ὐξοτομία. Verso, l. 3: change accent to grave in ζημειωθείς. L. 5: ἐ̣π̣άγω: change to ἐ̣π̣’ ἀ̣γ<αθ>ῷ dotting pi and alpha; τὸν ψήχον ἡμῶν: delete accents, regularize only if done so in the notes on p. 394 or add commentaries with possible parallels. Mark up the *dash*.
Submit - I submit to P. Mon. Epiph. 594, proofread print edition.
